mapper.select: select *, date_format(buy_date,'%Y-%m-%d')as order_date from user_tb as u join order_tb as o on o.user_id = u.id join product_tb as p on p.id = o.product_id where u.id=#{userId};

select o.user_id,p.eng_name,o.quantity,buy_date from user_tb as u join order_tb as o on o.user_id = u.id join product_tb as p on p.id = o.product_id where u.id=#{userId} AND buy_date BETWEEN #{orderStartDate} AND #{orderEndDate};
mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (username, password, tel, address, email, first_name, last_name) values( #{username}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{address},#{email},#{firstName},#{lastName});
insert into user_tb (username, password, tel, address, email, first_name, last_name,role) values( #{username}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{address},#{email},#{firstName},#{lastName},'admin');
